TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DownloadDataCompletedEventHandler(object sender, DownloadDataCompletedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DownloadDataCompletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DownloadDataCompletedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As DownloadDataCompletedEventArgs)
public delegate void DownloadDataCompletedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, DownloadDataCompletedEventArgs ^ e);
type DownloadDataCompletedEventHandler = delegate of obj * DownloadDataCompletedEventArgs -> unit

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks При создании делегата необходимо указать метод, обрабатывающий событие.When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. Чтобы связать событие с обработчиком событий, нужно добавить в событие экземпляр делегата.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. Обработчик событий вызывается всякий раз, когда происходит событие, если делегат не удален.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. Дополнительные сведения о делегатах обработчиков событий см. в разделе [обработка и вызов событий](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples В следующем примере кода демонстрируется загрузка ресурса, указанного пользователем.The following code example demonstrates downloading a user-specified resource. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#21](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#21)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#21)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#21)] Следующий метод вызывается после завершения загрузки.The following method is called when the download completes. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#22](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#22)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#22](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#22)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#22](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#22)]
